name: Game Technopolis Super Collection 1
overview: This compilation contains: Himitsu no Hanazono Kimi Dake ni Ai o... Dragon Eyes There's also a bonus section featuring a cyber novel called "miły -aisuruhito-" which serves as a parallel story to Dragon Eyes, "Music Room" allows you to listen to games music tracks, while in "Bishōjo overview 1" you can view profiles of the various female characters from the games.
